titleStmt.title: A commentarie vpon the booke of the Prouerbes of Salomon Published for the edification of the Church of God.
titleStmt.author: Moffett, Peter, d. 1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field for Robert Dexter dwelling in Pauls church-yard at the signe of the Brasen serpent,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: P.M., i.e. Peter Moffett.
Running title reads: A commentarie vpon the Prouerbes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Pauls church-yard at the signe of the Brasen serpent
